page.title: 03A TYPICAL HOME 1985
page.content: 1A three-bedrooomed detached house, 7 Manor Orchard, l7 years old. Garage 5.92m by 2.5lm, kitchen 5.l2 by l.27m, lounge 5.50m by 2.09m, dining room 3.78m by 3m, toilet l.88m by 7.6m, entrance hall 6.56m by l.88m, bathroom 3m by l.66m, bedroom 2.72m by l.90m, bedroom 4.40m by 2.l0m, bedroom 3.58m by 2.90m. Large garden back and front. Garage attached. Walls of brick. Front and back doors are wood with glass panels. Kitchen and lounge recently extended. Roof is of tiles. Walls are papered, floors are carpeted. Kitchen - dishwasher, fridge freezer, hob, eye-level cooker, washing machine. Garage - car, tumble drier. Lounge has fire, television, stereo, three piece suite. Bathroom has wash basin, bath, shower, toilet.
